name: Shadow Tower
overview: The dark shadow of the single-eyed crown reigned over the holy land of Zepter. The sealed, once-proud tower protecting the crown and and the Demon King is about to disappear into the earth, taking what remains of the town with it. Your quest takes you below the tower, where you must seek out and destroy the evil king, and retrieve his potent crown. Remain strong and true-of-heart, for there are legions of demons intent on raping your soul and leaving the remains. The evil lurks everywhere...
